metadata.description:
Living in the blinks between timezones, I’ve documented the last 10 years of my life through 1000+ microsongs – threads of transient nostalgia captured on tape.

Now trading nature immersion for urban hustle, I’m knitting together the last decade via release. “Old Friends New Cities” is a collaboration with photography platform Analogue People, and 10 photographers (5 men and 5 women), from around the world.

Curating a collection of 10 photos paired with my music – Analogue People has juxtaposed the realities of nomadic city life over a longing familiar to the metropolitan among us – a return home; to nature and to our roots.

lyrics.text:
Song: Millennia Grindstone
Artist: Dessauer
Collection: Old Friends New Cities
Curator: Analogue People
Photographer: Thomas Geppi
Year: 2023

metadata.name: Millennia Grindstone #1
